lines.gurmukhi: AYsI nwiekw mY kuAwr pwqR hI supwqR BlI Aws ipAwsI mwqw ipqw eykY kwh dyq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Aisee Naaikaa Mai Kuaar Paatr Hee Soupaatr Bhalee , Aas Piaasee Maataa Pitaa Aykai Kaah Dayt Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: A virgin maid who is ever hopeful of achieving a place of superior authority in the house of a husband that her father will find for her one day is far better than a deceitful woman.

lines.gurmukhi: AYsI nwiekw mY dInqw kY duhwgn BlI piqq pwvn piRA pwie lwie lyq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Aisee Naaikaa Mai Deenataa Kai Duhaagan Bhalee , Patit Paavan Pria Paai Laai Layt Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: A woman who has been disassociated with her husband by him and who regrets her actions by her humility, consequence of which her husband forgives her sins is far better than a deceitful woman.

lines.gurmukhi: AYsI nwiekw mY Blo ibrh ibEg sog lgn sgn soDy srDw shyq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Aisee Naaikaa Mai Bhalo Birah Biaog Soga , Lagan Sagan Sodhay Saradhaa Sahayt Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: That woman separated from her husband who bearing the pangs of separation is devotedly involved in finding out auspicious time and good omens for the reunion is better than a treacherous and deceitful woman.

lines.gurmukhi: AYsI nwiekw mwq grB hI glI BlI kpt snyh duibDw ijau rwhu kyqu hY ]450]
lines.transliteration_english: Aisee Naaikaa Maat Garabh Hee Galee Bhalee , Kapat Sanayh Doubidhaa Jiu Raahu Kaytu Hai ?450?

Shabad OS B.translation: Such a woman of deceitful love should have perished in her mother's womb. Deceit filled love is full of such duality as the two demons Rahu and Ketu are who cause solar and lunar eclipse.  (450)
